title: Worth the Wait
description: After curvy IT specialist Lena is dumped for her slim sister she realises her snobby mother is right – image is everything. Now invited to her ex-boyfriend’s wedding to her sister, Lena vows to shed some weight.Cute fitness-freak Caleb has never overcome his inner geekiness enough to ask Lena on a date. But when she asks him for weight loss advice he jumps at the chance to be her personal trainer. He doesn’t understand why she wants to lose her sexy curves, but he’ll do it if it means one-on-one time with her.Agreeing to accompany Lena to the wedding means he’ll get his date with her. But is Lena losing the weight to feel good about herself, or is it because she’s planning to win back her ex-boyfriend?Can Caleb convince Lena that in his eyes she’s perfect?
author: Rowena Candlish
